INTERSOG is an information technology company based in
California , USA founded in 2005. It is a privately held company providing outsourcing services in
Web 2.0
, Logistics Software, Open Source, LAMP, security and mobile ( iPhone and
Windows Mobile ) applications. Some of its better known partners are
Mitsubishi Motors North America and Aggregate Knowledge.
Company Profile
INTERSOG is an Information Technology company headquartered in Silicon Valley, focused on delivering the best and most cost-effective solutions to startup and mainstream high tech companies. INTERSOG is based in
Sunnyvale, California and has offices in Chicago, IL; near-shore office in
Vancouver , British Columbia; offshore centers in
Ukraine and China. INTERSOG offers full range of development services including outsourcing. They focus on custom software, database, web and mobile development; Enterprise application integration services; Business analysis and IT consulting; Design, implementation, testing, integration, maintenance and support
It has recently completed first phases of supply chain management solution for Mitsubishi Motors North America (MMNA). Like other automotive producers,
Mitsubishi uses many diverse stamping parts produced by suppliers to assemble their vehicles. All suppliers need steel to produce the parts, and Mitsubishi coordinates purchasing steel for all suppliers in order to buy steel cheaper and make sure that all suppliers have enough materials to meet Mitsubishi's production demands. INTERSOG's solution addresses the automotive producer's supply chain starting right back from the steel suppliers and stampers that produce individual parts for vehicles and their subcontractors. Reps from all involved parties can easily access one and same system, through the web, and see different slices of data based on their access rights and business functions. Two components of the solution are Order Planning application and Parts Database application. The system is deployed on AS400 (IBM iSeries) platform using IBM WebSphere. The solution is hosted by ADS Logistics and integrated with existing ADS system LoMaS.
Commercial Activities
INTERSOG provides expert consulting and product development service in Internet web services, Social networking web services, Online dating and relationships industry, Automotive industry, Supply Chain Management software, Logistics software, Educational software, Maritime and Vessel Traffic Management software, and Management Information Systems
Awards and Recognitions
1. INTERSOG is showcased by Microsoft for implementation of VTMIS systems based on .NET technology in Australian ports.
2. INTERSOG is aknowledged by Mitsubishi Motors for solution that addresses the automotive producer's supply chain
3. Aggregate Knowledge praises INTERSOG for expertise and customer value - LINK.
